Uses of Package
org.unbunt.ella.engine.environment

Packages that use org.unbunt.ella.engine.environment
org.unbunt.ella Provides an implementation of the EllaScript programming language. 
org.unbunt.ella.compiler.support Provides various utility classes to be used during the compilation of EllaScript programs. 
org.unbunt.ella.engine Provides an implementation of an execution engine for compiled EllaScript programs. 
org.unbunt.ella.engine.context Provides interfaces to be implemented by classes representing execution contexts of programs executed by the engine. 
org.unbunt.ella.engine.continuations Provides interfaces and classes representing continuations in the evaluation of expressions and statements. 
org.unbunt.ella.engine.corelang Provides core objects of the EllaScript language in the form of interfaces and classes. 
org.unbunt.ella.engine.environment Provides interfaces and classes modeling environments. 
 

Classes in org.unbunt.ella.engine.environment used by org.unbunt.ella
Env
          Represents an environment holding bindings of names to their respective values.
 

Classes in org.unbunt.ella.engine.environment used by org.unbunt.ella.compiler.support
Env
          Represents an environment holding bindings of names to their respective values.

Env
          Represents an environment holding bindings of names to their respective values.

          Represents an environment holding bindings of names to their respective values.

          Represents an environment holding bindings of names to their respective values.
 

Classes in org.unbunt.ella.engine.environment used by org.unbunt.ella.engine.corelang

Classes in org.unbunt.ella.engine.environment used by org.unbunt.ella.engine.environment
AbstractEnv
          Base class for environments.
DynamicVariableResolver
          Provides an interface for dynamically resolving variables.
Env
          Represents an environment holding bindings of names to their respective values.
SearchableEnv
          Provides an interface allowing to search for variables in the environment using the variable's name and bypassing any lookups in parent environments.
StaticEnv
          Represents a standard environment following the lexical addressing scheme.
WritableVariableResolver
          Provides an interface for updating values of dynamically resolved variables.
